data.Title: Google Trends Email Subscriptions Sunset
data.Description: As of 29 October 2024, Google Trends trend notifications will no longer be supported and existing alerts will no longer be sent. In addition, creating new trend alerts using the subscription page will no longer be possible.

data.Title: Google Search Now Supports AVIF Image Files
data.Description: Google Search now supports AVIF image file types after much anticipation and wait (and no, there is no SEO boost for using AVIF images)

data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update Analysis and Impact
data.Description: Reddit has become the third most visible site in Google's U.S. search results, following a recent core update. The article explores the reasons behind Reddit's rise, its implications for SEO, and potential conflicts of interest due to Google's investment in Reddit.

data.Title: Google Analytics 4 Introduces Benchmarking Data and Reports
data.Description: Google Analytics 4 benchmarking data and reports

data.Title: Google Testing New Shopping Search Interface
data.Description: New Google shopping search interface tests

data.Title: Google Ads Introduces Product Category-Level Insights
Google Search Tests Accordion UX for Frequently Visited Sites
data.Description: Google Search "you visit often" testing accordion UX

data.Title: Bing Enhances Featured Answers with Interactive Table of Contents
data.Description: Microsoft recently added an animation or highlight effect on its featured answers or knowledge panels at the top of its Bing Search results. When you hover your mouse over the table of content on the left side, the section it corresponds to in the answer, will expand.

data.Title: Google Experiments with New Map Pin Design
data.Description: Google is experimenting with a new design for map pins.

data.Title: Google's August 2024 Core Update Rollout Completed
data.Description: Google confirms the August core update has finished rolling out, taking 19 days to complete.
